channel.title: News - Polish Defense
channel.description: News articles related to Polish Defense

item.title: Poland's Defense Industry Showcased
item.description: The Polish defense industry demonstrates its prowess with 207 products from 61 companies, featuring innovations in electronics, cyberspace, armoured vehicles, and more.

item.title: Polish Defense Industry Showcases Innovations
item.description: The Polish defense industry demonstrates its leadership with 207 advanced technologies and solutions from 61 companies, spanning electronics, cyberspace, and more.

item.title: Annual HNS Conference on Defense System
item.description: The annual conference led by the Plenipotentiary of the Minister of National Defense focused on the HNS system within military and non-military defense units.
